price: 39 mais ne serez rétribués que pour prix de vos agissements.
arabic: وَمَا تُجۡزَوۡنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wamā tuj'zawna illā mā kuntum taʿmalūna
